name: ai.cerb.automationBuilder.interaction.worker.await.map
script:
start:
  # await:
  #   form:
  #     elements:
      # [TODO] region: world, us, europe, asia, africa

  return:
    snippet@text:
      map/respond_{{random_string(6)|lower}}:
        # See: https://cerb.ai/docs/maps/
        resource:
            uri: cerb:resource:map.world.countries
          projection:
            type: mercator
            scale: 90
            center:
              latitude: 0
              longitude: 0
        regions:
        points:
